sentences.en: After a comprehensive feasibility study on decision - making , objectively, the follow blindly.
sentences.cn: 经过美满的可行性查究不合析,作出发疯的决定, 制止盲目的跟盛行为.

sentences.en: As to other leaders, he also evaluated them fairly and objectively. Mr.
sentences.cn: 对太平天国其他领袖人物, 他都能够比较公正、客观地评价他们的功过是非.

sentences.en: Everything that exists objectively can be understood.
sentences.cn: 客观存在的事物都是能够被理解的.

sentences.en: Financial risk exists on enterprise financial all link of management objectively.
sentences.cn: 财务风险客观存在于企业财务管理工作的各个环节.

sentences.en: How to take affection tint and objectively look upon problem?
sentences.cn: 如何不带情感色彩而客观地看待问题?

sentences.en: Hung - chien said, " All right, all right, let me read it again calmly and objectively. "
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 道: “ 好, 好, 让我平心静气再看一遍. ”

sentences.en: Look at your skills objectively when deciding on a career change.
sentences.cn: 在决定改行时要客观地考虑自己的技能。

sentences.en: Objective: To objectively evaluate chilled pork color by instrumental measurement.
sentences.cn: 研究了仪器测定对冷却猪肉肉色客观评定分级的效果.

sentences.en: SG 2: Noncompliance issues are objectively tracked and communicated, and resolution is ensured.
sentences.cn: 中文大意是: 发现的问题要客观地被跟踪、沟通并解决.

sentences.en: So probably, objectively, he'd be better off going alone.
sentences.cn: 所以客观地说, 他最好应该选择独自离开.

sentences.en: Stand back and look objectively at the problem.
sentences.cn: 退一步，客观地看待这个问题。

sentences.en: The results show that B - value can objectively measure the degree of paperbrittleness.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,B值较客观地反映了纸质发脆的程度.

sentences.en: To dramatize the necessity of clandestine warfare, instructors objectively recited case histories and their import.
sentences.cn: 为了说明秘密战的必要性, 教官们客观地讲述了案例及其意义.

sentences.en: Try to view situations more objectively, especially with regard to work.
sentences.cn: 要尽量客观地分析情况，尤其是在工作上。

sentences.en: We simply want to inform people objectively about events.
sentences.cn: 我们只是想如实地向人们通报事件情况。

sentences.en: Your role as editor is important, for you can look at a piece of writing objectively.
sentences.cn: 你的编辑角色很重要，因为你能够客观地审视作品。

words.tran_cn: 目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格
使具体化，使客观化；体现

trans.tran_en: if you consider something objectively, you try to think about the facts, and not be influenced by your own feelings or opinions
